MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G61 postcode area of Bearsden. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:45pm due to a fault on the underground cable network caused by a third party on Norwood Park and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 5:19 PM on Friday, 29 January 2021.
